programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava) S2 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava»Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru) S1 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru»Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa wins a ride in Miss Rabbit's hot air balloon and the whole family comes along. Peppa drops Teddy and Papa Pig saves him. But if they get stuck in a tree, who will come and save them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Betsy la tondeuse) S2 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Betsy la tondeuse»L'herbe a beaucoup poussé, elle est devenue si haute que quand Peppa et George jouent dehors, ils ne se voient plus l'un l'autre et perdent leur ballon. Papy Pig va remédier à la situation en sortant sa tondeuse à gazon...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur) S2 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur»Zoe Zebra apporte une lettre très spéciale destinée à Peppa et George, il s'agit d'une invitation à leur fête d'anniversaire...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Robot Toutou !) S6 (12/29)
programme.desc: «Robot Toutou !»Robo Puppy!: When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him! (S6, ep 7).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (11/18)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge) S4 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge»Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers) S1 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers»The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le chat de la jungle) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Le chat de la jungle»The Ocelot's Tale: A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life. (S2, ep 7b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sorry, Not Sorry) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Sorry, Not Sorry»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Ma petite dent) S1 (3/28)
programme.desc: «Ma petite dent»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (A la recherche du sac perdu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «A la recherche du sac perdu»Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La compétition de Snowboard / Sauvetage en mer) S2 (23/26)
programme.desc: «La compétition de Snowboard / Sauvetage en mer»Jake and Everest organize a snowboard competition, but snowfall makes the track invisible. Captain Turbot has a software system to control his diving bell. Chickaletta, Cali and a seagull end up underwater.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle donne une leçon de musique à ses élèves. Il s'en suit une joyeuse cacophonie mais des grandes personnes arrivent et les choses s'arragent...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (25/78)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (26/78)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»Into the Blueniverse!: It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into the Blueniverse! Where has it gone? (S3, ep 17).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La surprise de Ryder) S7 (n°14)
programme.desc: «La surprise de Ryder»Pups Save Ryder's Surprise: Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save the gift and Carlos. (S7, ep 14b).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La bonne vieille source / Le poney) S3 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La bonne vieille source / Le poney»Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma) S3 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma»The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La légende du Capitaine Calavera) S1 (1/21)
programme.desc: «La légende du Capitaine Calavera»When Santiago discovers the lost treasure of the legendary Capitán Calavera, he and his friends become the new Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Titine la tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Titine la tortue»Titine, la tortue du docteur Hamster, est coincée dans un arbre une fois de plus...

programme.title: Peppa Pig en anglais (At the beach) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «At the beach»Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Madame Patte géante) S1 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Madame Patte géante»George finds a spider in the bathroom sink. Peppa is very scared until she realizes he doesn't want to harm her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»Peppa et George se demandent quoi offrir à leur maman à l'occasion de son anniversaire. Ils interrogent papa Cochon à ce sujet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le super lot géant) S4 (6/20)
programme.desc: «Le super lot géant»At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine. So to earn money, Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Ninja Blaze) S4 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Ninja Blaze»Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex, le louveteau / Surprise !) S2 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Alex, le louveteau / Surprise !»While camping, Marshall and the PAW Patrol help Alex learn about Fire Safety!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Maurice et Mauricette / L'os de dinosaure) S2 (21/26)
programme.desc: «Maurice et Mauricette / L'os de dinosaure»The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le collier porte-bonheur / La surprise de Vigo) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «Le collier porte-bonheur / La surprise de Vigo»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava) S2 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava»Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.desc: «Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur»Zoe Zebra apporte une lettre très spéciale destinée à Peppa et George, il s'agit d'une invitation à leur fête d'anniversaire...

programme.desc: «Sorry, Not Sorry»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.desc: «Ma petite dent»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (A la recherche du sac perdu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «A la recherche du sac perdu»Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.desc: «La compétition de Snowboard / Sauvetage en mer»Jake and Everest organize a snowboard competition, but snowfall makes the track invisible. Captain Turbot has a software system to control his diving bell. Chickaletta, Cali and a seagull end up underwater.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle donne une leçon de musique à ses élèves. Il s'en suit une joyeuse cacophonie mais des grandes personnes arrivent et les choses s'arragent...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (29/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (30/78)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'arc-en-ciel de Blue) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La lettre mystère) S3 (10/18)
programme.desc: «La lettre mystère»It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! So we play Blue's Clues to find out.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les Bébés Tortues de Mer / La baleine échouée) S1 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les Bébés Tortues de Mer / La baleine échouée»102A - PUPS SAVE THE SEA TURTLES The PAW Patrol pups are playing at the beach when they discover - SEA TURTLE HATCHLINGS! - But the turtles have no way to cross the road and get to the water. Ryder and pups must make them a safe route to the bay. 102B - PUPS AND THE VERY BIG BABY A baby whale has beached itself in Adventure Bay and Ryder and PAW Patrol race to the rescue. With the help of the PAW Patrol the baby whale makes it to the water's edge and swims out to his Mom. Good job Paw Patrol!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern in 'Treasure Park', and then in 'Baddy Long Legs', Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a real crisis! (S2, ep 15).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent) S2 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent»Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Brood) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Brood»

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Danny et l'ours / Les tulipes) S3 (16/26)
programme.desc: «Danny et l'ours / Les tulipes»When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Que les jeux commencent / La journée du sport) S3 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Que les jeux commencent / La journée du sport»It's sports day and especially for Everest, Ryder and the puppies are building a snow ramp. And that in the middle of summer!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble»Animated adventures for young viewers. Meet Baby Shark and William ? together these best friends laugh, learn and have fun alongside the colourful characters of the hometown, Carnivore Cove, including the whole Shark family: Mommy Shark, Daddy Shark, Grandma Shark and Grandpa Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le bracelet de Lorelai / Le bateau fantôme) S1 (10/21)
programme.desc: «Le bracelet de Lorelai / Le bateau fantôme»Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form! // Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré) S1 (3/21)
programme.desc: «Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré»When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Peppa and George are at the seaside with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Peppa and George like sandy beaches, but this is a different kind of beach, with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. Peppa, George, Granny and Grandpa Pig have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de sortie de Teddy) S2 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de sortie de Teddy»Peppa and her family are having a picnic lunch. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic together. When it's time to go home, Peppa is having such a good time that, when it's home time, she leaves her teddy behind. But all ends well when Zoë Zebra and Mr Zebra the Postman make a very special delivery to Peppa's house...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Rebecca Rabbit has a little bother called Richard who is the same age as George. George and Richard each have a toy dinosaur but George and Richard are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows George and Richard that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle voiture) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle voiture»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La chasse au trésor) S1 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pas très bien) S1 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Pas très bien»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les T-Rex égarés) S4 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Les T-Rex égarés»Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le super skateboard) S7 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le super skateboard»It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Luc Luky / L'aigle à la patte ficelée) S2 (25/26)
programme.desc: «Luc Luky / L'aigle à la patte ficelée»When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le festival de la confiture / Le cochon surfeur) S3 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Le festival de la confiture / Le cochon surfeur»Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.
